article: How to Get Rid of Bad Luck
intro: If you're superstitious or you just feel like youâ€™ve been dealt a bad hand lately, you may be wondering how to get luck on your side. Fortunately, there are many things you can do to get rid of your

steps.title: to another country.
steps.subtitle: Traveling to another country is said to get rid of bad luck, as the bad luck gets left behind and will disperse in your absence. The further you can get away from your home country, the better.
sub-points: Crossing an ocean or flying to somewhere in a different time zone works best.
Travelling could also help you to realize that the bad luck is not on you, but on your house or job situation.
Taking some time away may help you to understand the changes that need to made on your return, in order to get rid of bad luck.

steps.title: Be careful of superstitions that foretell death and sickness.
steps.subtitle: Most superstitions only foretell bad luck, however some superstitions also foretell death and sickness. You should definitely familiarize yourself with these:
sub-points: If a robin flies into a room through a window, death will shortly follow.
You must hold your breath while going past a cemetery or you will breathe in the spirit of someone who has recently died.
If you open your front door and are greeted by a magpie staring at you, this is a sure sign of death
If you dream of death it's a sign of a birth, if you dream of birth, it's a sign of death.
If the left eye twitches there will soon be a death in the family.
A white moth inside the house or trying to enter the house means death.
Dreaming of white is believed to foreshadow death.
